about_me.description:
I'm a Front-End Developer with over 4 years of experience working within the Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) platform, building high-traffic, accessible, and responsive websites using HTML5, ISML, CSS/SASS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and SFRA with Page Designer.

With over 15 years of experience as a Graphic and Web Designer, I have a strong creative mindset and attention to detail, with the ability to manage projects from concept to launch and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, scalable solutions.
